issue.title: [C++] -Dzlib_SOURCE=BUNDLED on Windows does not produce arrow.dll with zlib statically linked
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6587](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6587). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is one possible cause of ARROW-6584. The intent of the BUNDLED arguments is to facilitate creating shared libraries with the dependencies statically linked, so this seems to violate the intent of these arguments
